title: No box from S rank?
body:
I played a game with Soraka that i own (and have no frame around the champion icon in lobby). Got no box afterwards, our Zed had S+
Any reason to this problem? I do have 1 chest availible still.

replies.body:
I got a S Grade with Sona going 18/8/16. AND i didn't get no BOX at all. 

I mean A CHEST.{{champion:37}}

As *Kitty* mentioned, you'll only earn a chest if either you or someone in your *premade group* earns an S-, S or S+ grade for their performance. Additionally, any chests you earn on a champ, even if someone else got the S-grade, will count towards that champion for the rest of the season. These chests will reset next season, so you'll be able to earn a lot more potential chests after the reset.

Let me know if you have any questions.
Were you queued with the Zed?
I was not premade with him no, he was on my team.
You only get boxes if you or your premade gets an S
